sentences.sentence: Chilli con carne is the third most popular dish for cooks toattemp.
sentences.translation: 香辣肉酱排在最受欢迎榜单的第三位。

sentences.sentence: I go outside on my break and sit on the concrete step behind Casa DE la Carne by myself.
sentences.translation: 轮到我的工间休息时，我走到外面，独自一人坐在“肉之家”后面的水泥台阶上。

sentences.sentence: When I show up at Casa de la Carne the next day, Carina pulls me aside and asks what I’m doing there.
sentences.translation: 等 我第二天来到“肉之家”的时候，卡丽娜把我拽到一边，问我来干什么。
